author: Special Correspondent
text:
DMK chief M. Karunanidhi on Thursday expressed his condolences to the family of jawan K. Vijayakumar (23) of the Indian Army, who lost his life after he was buried alive in an avalanche in Kargil on March 17.

10 soldiers died in Siachen last month

Mr. Karunanidhi said the Centre should take steps to ensure that lives of Indian soldiers were not lost in such accidents, recalling the death of 10 soldiers in Siachen last month.

The jawan’s body was laid to rest in his native town of Vallaramapuram near Puliyangudi in Tirunelveli district on Wednesday.
title: Karunanidhi condoles jawan’s death
